testcase.name: Run all functions in order
testcase.system-out: Given the application is opened.............................................passed When user opens registration page and registers with data from sheet "Registration" row 1.passed Then registration should be successful......................................passed When user logs in with username "{registered}" and password "{registered}"..passed Then login result should be "success".......................................passed When user navigates to Accounts Overview....................................passed Then Accounts table should show Account, Balance, Available Amount..........passed When user opens a "SAVINGS" account.........................................passed Then "Account Opened" message should appear.................................passed When user transfers data from sheet "Transfer" row 1........................passed Then transfer result should be "success"....................................passed When user updates profile from sheet "UpdateProfile" row 1..................passed Then profile update message should be shown.................................passed When user applies loan from sheet "Loan" row 1..............................passed Then loan status should be displayed........................................passed
